query:
ALTER TABLE `paymentProviders`
  MODIFY `accessToken` TEXT NOT NULL,
  MODIFY `refreshToken` TEXT NOT NULL,
  MODIFY `tokenExpiresAt` DATETIME(3) NOT NULL,
  MODIFY `providerAccountId` VARCHAR(255) NULL,
  MODIFY `providerEmail` VARCHAR(255) NULL,
  MODIFY `config` JSON NULL,
  MODIFY `lastSyncAt` DATETIME(3) NULL,
  MODIFY `lastErrorAt` DATETIME(3) NULL,
  MODIFY `lastErrorMessage` TEXT NULL;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3VZWkmDdVMGTAoV.53e2061c2123 --database FUrq59UAJ9LE4f7MefV9tg --execute ALTER TABLE `paymentProviders`
  MODIFY `accessToken` TEXT NOT NULL,
  MODIFY `refreshToken` TEXT NOT NULL,
  MODIFY `tokenExpiresAt` DATETIME(3) NOT NULL,
  MODIFY `providerAccountId` VARCHAR(255) NULL,
  MODIFY `providerEmail` VARCHAR(255) NULL,
  MODIFY `config` JSON NULL,
  MODIFY `lastSyncAt` DATETIME(3) NULL,
  MODIFY `lastErrorAt` DATETIME(3) NULL,
  MODIFY `lastErrorMessage` TEXT NULL;
